derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from French préhistorique (see pre-, historic)

entry.tran: 史前的；有文字记载以前的
entry.def: Prehistoric people and things existed at a time before information was written down.

example.ex: ...the famous prehistoric cave paintings of Lascaux.
example.tran: 拉斯科著名的史前山洞壁画

means.word_mean: 1. belonging to or existing in times before recorded history;
2. of or relating to times before written history;

sentences.sentence: "my mother has these prehistoric ideas about proper clothes"
